notes:
In order to recycle at curbside, you must have a Town of Halifax recycling bin.  Recyclables are collected every other week. Bag or tie paper products and place them on top of the bin or next to the bin.Place bins curbside by 7:00 AM on collection day.
Do not put paper products loose in the recycling bin.
